definition: to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: The news took a load off my mind.
sentences.chinese: 這個消息解除了我的思想顧慮。

sentences.english: Did not have painful apprehension, thick nature is meddlesome .
sentences.chinese: 沒有了痛的顧慮，粗自然是好事了。

sentences.english: Pregnant mothers may also be concerned about eating fish because of the mercury content.
sentences.chinese: 準媽媽也對喫魚有顧慮，擔心其汞含量超標。

sentences.english: In fact, this is also home to many foreign investors intent concerns.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，這也是許多意圖進行海外置地投資者的顧慮。

sentences.english: But concerns over intellectual property rights have proved to be unfounded.
sentences.chinese: 對於知識產權問題存在顧慮顯然多此一舉。

sentences.english: Some of Mr. Dreher's worries sound familiar.
sentences.chinese: 德雷爾的一些顧慮聽起來很耳熟。

sentences.english: We all have these concerns when planning a vacation.
sentences.chinese: 當我們計劃假期時，總有這些顧慮。

sentences.english: The customer does not need to configure the platform or take care of reserving hardware resources.
sentences.chinese: 客戶無需配置平臺或者顧慮保留硬件資源。

sentences.english: Only the Swiss dressage team pulled out because of concerns about the weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 只有瑞士的馴馬隊因爲顧慮到天氣情況退出比賽。

sentences.english: He seldom regards his wife's wishes.
sentences.chinese: 他很少顧慮到妻子的願。

sentences.english: Have more scruples about this and that.
sentences.chinese: 對身邊白勺1切都有更多白勺顧慮。

sentences.english: But even then, she cautions that you're walking a precarious line.
sentences.chinese: 即使如此，她也顧慮你走在一條岌岌可危的路上。

sentences.english: Companies deeply involved in virtualization report several concerns. The top three
sentences.chinese: 深入使用虛擬化的公司報告了他們的七種顧慮。
凱瑟琳由於出於孝心而有所顧慮，這我們應當尊重。

sentences.english: When she begins talking she does not prioritize the significance of any problem.
sentences.chinese: 只要她一開始談論，她就不會顧慮到問題的優先順序。

sentences.english: Taiwanese travel agents said this reflected concerns on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 臺旅行社說這反映了雙方的顧慮。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to worry about/to be concerned about
